metadata.titleEn: Geochemical data set of the Paleocene-Eocene  thermal maximum at Gamba and Tingri, southern Tibet
metadata.titleCn: 藏南定日和岗巴地区古新世-始新世极热事件地球化学数据集
metadata.description: This data set comes from shallow marine carbonate sections at Tingri and Gamba, south Tibet. The age of these samples is about 56 Ma (at the Paleocene-Eocene boundary). At Tingri, we studied two parallel sections (13ZS section and 10-11TM section), and at Gamba, we studied one section (11TMG). From the 13ZS section, we analyzed carbon and oxygen isotopic compositions and calcium carbonate content of the whole carbonate rock, as well as the in-situ carbon isotopic compositions and element contents of the foraminifera shell. From the 10-11TM section, we analyzed carbon, oxygen and strontium isotopic compositions of the whole rock. From the 11TMG section, we analyzed carbon and oxygen isotopic compositions of the whole carbonate rock. Carbon and oxygen isotopic compositions of the whole rock were measured by gas isotope mass spectrometer (MAT251), strontium isotope by thermal ionization mass spectrometry (TIMS), calcium carbonate content by acid dissolution, in-situ carbon isotopic compositions by SIMS, and in-situ element contents by LA-ICPMS. Among these data, in-situ carbon isotope data were obtained from the laboratory of Professor John Valley at the University of Wisconsin-Madison in the United States, and the rest are from the relevant laboratories of the Department of Geosciences at the University of Bremen in Germany. Based on these data, we published three peer-reviewed papers on Journals of Gondwana Research, GSA Bulletin, and Global and Planetary Change.
metadata.descriptionCn: 本数据集来自藏南的定日和岗巴地区浅海含大有孔虫碳酸盐岩剖面，样品时代为约5600万年（古新世-始新世界线处）。在定日地区，我们研究了两个平行剖面（13ZS剖面和10-11TM剖面），在岗巴地区，我们研究了一个剖面（11TMG）。在13ZS剖面上，我们分析了碳酸盐岩全岩的碳氧同位素组成和碳酸钙含量，以及大有孔虫壳体上原位碳同位素组成和元素含量。在10-11TM剖面上，我们分析了全岩的碳氧锶同位素组成。在11TMG剖面上，我们分析了碳酸盐岩全岩的碳氧同位素组成。在这些数据中，全岩碳氧同位素组成是通过气体同位素质谱仪获得（MAT251），锶同位素是通过热电离质谱（TIMS）获得，碳酸钙含量通过酸溶法获得，原位碳同位素组成通过二次离子质谱获得（SIMS），原位元素含量通过激光剥蚀等离子体质谱仪获得（LA-ICPMS）。在这些数据中，原位碳同位素数据来自美国威斯康辛大学麦迪逊分校John Valley教授的实验室，其余数据均来自德国不来梅大学地球科学系的相关实验室。基于这些数据，我们在Gondwana Research, GSA Bulletin 和Global and Planetary Change 上共发表了3篇论文。
metadata.instructions: Geochemical data set of the Paleocene-Eocene thermal maximum in southern tibet.xlsx
metadata.instructionsCn: 藏南古新世-始新世极热事件地球化学数据集.xlsx

background: The Paleocene-Eocene thermal maximum (PETM) is one of the most pronounced global warming events in the Cenozoic. This event was associated with a large negative carbon isotope excursion (CIE) and with major changes in the atmosphere, hydrosphere, and biosphere. About 56 m.y. ago, global temperature rose rapidly by at least 4–5 °C, and this temperature anomaly persisted for ~170 k.y. This event, now called the Paleocene-Eocene thermal maximum (PETM), was associated with severe carbonate dissolution on the deep-sea floor and with a ~2–7‰ negative carbon isotope excursion (CIE), indicating a massive addition of 13 C-depleted carbon into the atmosphere-ocean system. The CIE was documented by diverse substrates from different depositional environments, ranging from paleosol carbonate, tooth enamel, plant lipids, soil organic matter on land to foraminifera, bulk carbonate, and marine organic matter in the ocean. Therefore, the CIE reflects a global geochemical event, and not a regional carbon perturbation. Along with the PETM-CIE, dramatic changes took place in the ocean-atmosphere system, such as a marked increase in atmospheric CO2 concentration, intensified seasonal precipitation and weathering, abrupt reversal of deep-ocean circulation, rapid ocean acidification, and increased ocean stratification. In different ecosystems, fauna and flora showed variable responses to this warming event. On land, insect herbivory increased sharply as floral composition changed from mixed gymnosperms and angiosperms prior to the PETM to almost exclusively angiosperms during the PETM. Many mammals became smaller, and migrated from Asia to North America. In the tropical surface ocean, reef-building corals retreated to middle latitudes, planktonic foraminifera diversified rapidly, and calcareous nannoplankton experienced increased rates of origination and extinction. In the deep ocean, smaller benthic foraminifera suffered one of the largest extinctions in the Cenozoic with the loss of ~30%–50% species. Despite substantial progress in the PETM studies, how larger benthic foraminifera (LBFs) in the shallow Tethyan Ocean responded to the PETM is still debated.
research objective: In this study, we investigate two shallow-marine, LBF-rich carbonate sections from south Tibet, aiming to locate the position of the Paleocene/Eocene (P/E) boundary in the Tethyan shallow benthic zones (SBZs) and to examine the response of the LBFs to the PETM. In summary, we construct a LBF biostratigraphy, pinpoint the P/E boundary in the SBZs, and discuss the LBF response to the PETM.
challenges: Unfortunately, it appears that some studied sections from Spain and Egypt do not meet these requirements, because they either comprise non-marine sediments or contain reworked LBFs in the stratigraphic interval close to the P/E boundary. Thus, even for some fully marine carbonate sections with in situ LBFs, whether these sections are “complete” on millennial time scales and have preserved carbonate sediments produced in this geologically brief time interval is also vital to the precise designation of the P/E boundary and to understanding of the LBF response to the PETM.
methods: In this study, we logged section 13ZS at Tingri (N28°41 ′35 ″, E86°42 ′32 ″) and section 11TMG at Gamba (N28°17 ′01 ″, E88°31 ′47 ″). For δ13 C and δ18 O analyses, samples were cut to expose their fresh surfaces. On their fresh surfaces, diagenetically less-altered micrites and LBF fragments were carefully micro-drilled under a light microscope. About 20 g of material was obtained from each sample and then ground to powder in an agate mortar. For δ13 C and δ18 O measurements, ~100 µg of rock powder were reacted with phosphoric acid at 75 °C in an automated carbonate unit. The isotopic composition (δ13 C, δ18 O) of the resulting CO2 was measured with a Finnigan MAT 251 gas isotope ratio mass spectrometer at the MARUM, University of Bremen.
findings: The combination of the carbon isotope data and constructed SBZs shows that the P/E boundary is located within SBZ5, not at the SBZ4/SBZ5 transition as proposed in the Western Tethyan domain. At the P/E boundary, no evident compositional change in LBF assemblages can be observed. However, a major compositional change in LBF assemblages occurs in the CIE recovery, characterized by the sudden disappearance of Miscellanea, Ranikothalia, Setia, Orbitosiphon, and the initial dominance of porcellaneous-walled Alveolina and Orbitolites together with small miliolids and rotaliids.
backgroundCn: 古新世-始新世热极大事件（PETM）是新生代中最显著的全球变暖事件之一。该事件与大规模的负碳同位素偏移（CIE）以及大气、水圈和生物圈的重大变化相关。大约在5600万年前，全球温度迅速上升至少4-5°C，并且这种温度异常持续了约17万年。这个事件现在被称为古新世-始新世热极大事件（PETM），与深海底部严重的碳酸盐溶解以及约2-7‰的负碳同位素偏移（CIE）相关，表明大量的13C贫乏碳被释放到大气-海洋系统中。CIE通过来自不同沉积环境的多样化基质得到了记录，从古土壤碳酸盐、牙齿琺瑯质、植物脂质、土壤有机物到海洋中的有孔虫、散装碳酸盐和海洋有机物。因此，CIE反映了一个全球性的地球化学事件，而不是区域性的碳扰动。伴随着PETM-CIE，海洋-大气系统发生了剧烈变化，例如大气CO2浓度显著增加、季节性降水和风化加剧、深海环流的突然逆转、快速的海洋酸化以及海洋分层加剧。在不同生态系统中，动植物对这一变暖事件的反应各不相同。在陆地上，昆虫取食率急剧增加，植物组成从PETM之前的混合裸子植物和被子植物转变为几乎完全由被子植物组成。在热带表层海洋中，建造珊瑚礁的珊瑚向中纬度退缩，浮游有孔虫迅速多样化，钙质纳米浮游植物的起源和灭绝率增加。在深海中，较小的底栖有孔虫经历了新生代中最大的灭绝之一，损失了约30%-50%的物种。尽管在PETM研究方面取得了显著进展，但关于浅层特提斯海中较大底栖有孔虫（LBFs）对PETM的反应仍然存在争议。
research objectiveCn: 在本研究中，我们调查了来自南藏的两个浅海、富含底栖有孔虫（LBF）的碳酸盐剖面，旨在确定特提斯浅水底栖区（SBZs）中古新世/始新世（P/E）界限的位置，并考察LBF对古新世温室气候事件（PETM）的响应。总之，我们构建了LBF生物地层，确定了SBZs中的P/E界限，并讨论了LBF对PETM的响应。
challengesCn: 不幸的是，来自西班牙和埃及的一些研究段落似乎不符合这些要求，因为它们要么包含非海洋沉积物，要么在与P/E边界接近的地层区间内含有再加工的LBF。因此，即使对于一些具有原位LBF的完全海洋碳酸盐段落，是否在千年时间尺度上是“完整”的，以及是否保存了在这个地质短暂时间间隔内产生的碳酸盐沉积物，对于精确确定P/E边界以及理解LBF对PETM的响应也是至关重要的。
methodsCn: 在本研究中，我们记录了丁日的13ZS段（N28°41′35″，E86°42′32″）和甘巴的11TMG段（N28°17′01″，E88°31′47″）。为了进行δ13C和δ18O分析，样品被切割以暴露其新鲜表面。在其新鲜表面上，经过成岩作用较少改变的微晶和LBF碎片在光学显微镜下小心地进行微钻取。每个样品获得约20克材料，然后在玛瑙研钵中研磨成粉。对于δ13C和δ18O测量，约100微克的岩石粉末在75°C下与磷酸反应，使用自动碳酸盐装置。生成的CO2的同位素组成（δ13C，δ18O）在不来梅大学MARUM的Finnigan MAT 251气体同位素比质谱仪上进行测量。
findingsCn: 碳同位素数据与构建的SBZ（生物带区）结合表明，P/E边界位于SBZ5内，而不是西地中海域所提出的SBZ4/SBZ5过渡处。在P/E边界处，LBF（微型有孔虫）组合没有明显的组成变化。然而，在CIE（碳同位素异常）恢复期间，LBF组合发生了重大组成变化，表现为Miscellanea、Ranikothalia、Setia、Orbitosiphon的突然消失，以及壳壁为瓷质的Alveolina和Orbitolites的初步主导地位，伴随小型的米利虫和旋孔虫。

background: The Paleocene-Eocene Thermal Maximum (PETM) was a geologically rapid and transient warming event that occurred ca. 56 million years ago (Ma). It was associated with a pronounced negative carbon isotope excursion (CIE) and with profound changes in the atmosphere, hydrosphere and biosphere. A geologically rapid event characterized by profound changes in biotic evolution, climate and geochemical cycling occurred at the Paleocene-Eocene transition. During this event, now called the Paleocene-Eocene Thermal Maximum (PETM), global temperature increased by N4° C within several thousand years. This warming event was accompanied by a global negative CIE of ~2–8‰ and severe carbonate dissolution on the ocean floor. The combination of the CIE and carbonate dissolution indicates that a large amount of 13C–depleted carbon was injected into the atmosphere-ocean system.
research objective: In this study, we present the first records of carbon isotope composition of bulk carbonate (δ13C_carb) and wt% CaCO3 (weight percentage) from two parallel limestone sections (13ZS and 10/11TM) at Tingri (south Tibet), and the δ13C_carb data show that an expanded CIE profile is preserved in this area. Then, we use data of Sr and Mn concentrations and 87Sr/86Sr ratios to exclude the possibility of diagenetic alteration. By comparing the background δ13C_carb values at Tingri with the background δ13C values of mixed-layer foraminifer Acarinina from different ODP Sites, we confirm that the δ13C_carb records from the shallow epicontinental sea of the Tingri area can reflect the carbon cycling in the open surface ocean. In the end, we discuss the stepped CIE profile and the CIE magnitude during the PETM.
challenges: Although ODP Site 690 was regarded as the reference section for the PETM, the validity of the stepped CIE profile recorded in its bulk carbonate has been called into question, on the basis of two lines of evidence: (1) the δ13C measurements of both planktonic and benthic foraminifera from the same section cannot reproduce the stepped CIE profile, and (2) the stepped CIE profile was thought to be caused by vital effects of nannoplankton. The issue about the primary nature of the stepped CIE remains unresolved, because an expanded, high-resolution stepped CIE profile has not been observed so far.
methods: Here, we present carbon isotope data of bulk carbonate from two parallel limestone sections at Tingri (south Tibet), where the limestone was deposited on a tropical carbonate ramp during the PETM.
dataset: Carbon isotope data of bulk carbonate from both sections are almost identical, displaying an expanded stepped CIE profile with large magnitude. The stepped CIE profile consists of three discrete intervals of decreasing carbon isotope values, which can be correlated on an inter-regional scale between sections from different depositional environments (lake, carbonate ramp, continental slope, and open ocean).
findings: The consistency of these correlations implies occurrence of at least three carbon releases within the CIE and indicates complex processes of carbon injection during the PETM. Moreover, the CIE magnitude of ~7‰ recorded at Tingri is tentatively interpreted to reflect carbon isotope changes in the atmosphere and the surface ocean, which is larger than the generally accepted value of ~4‰ but is still within the range of some previous records.
backgroundCn: 古新世-始新世热极大事件（PETM）是发生在大约5600万年前的一个地质快速和短暂的变暖事件。它与明显的负碳同位素偏移（CIE）以及大气、水圈和生物圈的深刻变化相关联。这个事件被称为古新世-始新世热极大事件（PETM），在这个事件中，全球温度在几千年内增加了超过4°C。这个变暖事件伴随着约2–8‰的全球负CIE和海洋底部严重的碳酸盐溶解。CIE和碳酸盐溶解的结合表明，大量的13C-贫碳被注入到大气-海洋系统中。
research objectiveCn: 在本研究中，我们呈现了来自南藏廷日地区两个平行石灰岩剖面（13ZS 和 10/11TM）的块状碳酸盐的碳同位素组成（δ13C_carb）和碳酸钙重量百分比（wt% CaCO3）的首次记录。δ13C_carb 数据表明该地区保存了扩展的碳同位素异常（CIE）剖面。然后，我们利用锶和锰浓度及87Sr/86Sr比值的数据排除了成岩改造的可能性。通过将廷日地区的背景 δ13C_carb 值与不同海洋钻探计划（ODP）站点的混层有孔虫 Acarinina 的背景 δ13C 值进行比较，我们确认廷日地区浅表海域的 δ13C_carb 记录可以反映开放表层海洋中的碳循环。最后，我们讨论了PETM期间的阶梯状CIE剖面和CIE幅度。
challengesCn: 尽管ODP 690站被认为是PETM的参考剖面，但其块状碳酸盐记录的阶梯式CIE特征的有效性受到质疑，基于两条证据：(1) 来自同一剖面的浮游和底栖有孔虫的δ13C测量无法重现阶梯式CIE特征；(2) 阶梯式CIE特征被认为是由纳米浮游生物的生理效应引起的。关于阶梯式CIE的原始性质的问题仍未解决，因为迄今为止尚未观察到扩展的高分辨率阶梯式CIE特征。
methodsCn: 在这里，我们呈现了来自南藏廷日两个平行石灰岩剖面的整体碳同位素数据，这些石灰岩是在PETM期间沉积在热带碳酸盐坡道上的。
datasetCn: 来自两个剖面的整体碳酸盐的碳同位素数据几乎相同，显示出一个扩展的阶梯式碳同位素异常（CIE）轮廓，幅度较大。阶梯式CIE轮廓由三个离散区间组成，碳同位素值逐渐降低，这些区间可以在不同沉积环境（湖泊、碳酸盐坡、陆坡和开放海洋）之间进行区域间的关联。
findingsCn: 这些相关性的持续性暗示在PETM期间至少发生了三次碳释放，并表明碳注入的过程复杂。此外，Tingri记录的约7‰的CIE幅度暂时被解释为反映大气和表层海洋中的碳同位素变化，这一幅度大于一般接受的约4‰的值，但仍在一些先前记录的范围内。

Verification.QuestionEn: Do the data collection methods for carbon isotope analysis in the field involve the use of gas isotope ratio mass spectrometry?
Verification.QuestionCn: 碳同位素分析的现场数据收集方法是否涉及气体同位素比质谱法的使用？

Verification.QuestionEn: Are the carbon isotope data from the Tingri area used to reflect carbon cycling in the open surface ocean?
Verification.QuestionCn: 丁日地区的碳同位素数据是否用于反映开放海洋表面的碳循环？

Disjunctive.QuestionEn: Which data collection method is primarily used for obtaining carbon isotope data in the field of geochemistry, gas isotope ratio mass spectrometry (GIRMS) or secondary ion mass spectrometry (SIMS)?
Disjunctive.QuestionCn: 在地球化学领域，主要用于获取碳同位素数据的数据收集方法是气体同位素比质谱法（GIRMS）还是次级离子质谱法（SIMS）？

Concept Completion.QuestionEn: Where are the two parallel limestone sections studied for bulk carbonate carbon isotope data located?
Concept Completion.QuestionCn: 研究用于整体碳酸盐碳同位素数据的两个平行石灰岩层位于哪里？

Concept Completion.QuestionEn: What challenges are associated with identifying the Paleocene/Eocene boundary in marine carbonate sections?
Concept Completion.QuestionCn: 在海洋碳酸盐层中识别古新世/始新世边界面临哪些挑战？
Concept Completion.AnswerEn: Determining if sections are 'complete' on millennial time scales
Concept Completion.AnswerCn: 在千年时间尺度上确定部分是否“完整”

Example.QuestionEn: Can you provide an example of a data collection method used to obtain carbon isotope data in paleoclimatology studies?
Example.QuestionCn: 您能否提供一个用于获取古气候学研究中碳同位素数据的数据收集方法的例子？
Example.AnswerEn: In the field of paleoclimatology, carbon isotope data can be collected using gas isotope ratio mass spectrometry. For instance, in analyses, samples are cut to expose fresh surfaces, and micrites and foraminifera fragments are micro-drilled to obtain material. The isotopic composition (δ13C, δ18O) of the resulting CO2 from the reaction with phosphoric acid is measured using a gas isotope ratio mass spectrometer such as the Finnigan MAT 251.
Example.AnswerCn: 在古气候学领域，碳同位素数据可以通过气体同位素比质谱法收集。例如，在分析中，样品被切割以暴露新鲜表面，微晶石灰岩和有孔虫碎片被微钻以获取材料。通过与磷酸反应产生的二氧化碳的同位素组成（δ13C，δ18O）使用气体同位素比质谱仪（如Finnigan MAT 251）进行测量。

Example.QuestionEn: What is an example of a challenge faced when trying to determine the completeness of marine carbonate sections for identifying the Paleocene/Eocene boundary?
Example.QuestionCn: 在试图确定海洋碳酸盐层的完整性以识别古新世/始新世边界时，面临的一个挑战是什么？
Example.AnswerEn: A challenge in determining the completeness of marine carbonate sections is ensuring that sections are complete on millennial time scales and have preserved carbonate sediments produced in the geologically brief interval of the Paleocene/Eocene boundary. Some sections, like those from Spain and Egypt, contain either non-marine sediments or reworked foraminifera, complicating the precise designation of the boundary.
Example.AnswerCn: 确定海洋碳酸盐层的完整性面临的一个挑战是确保这些层在千年时间尺度上是完整的，并且保存了在古新世/始新世边界这一地质上短暂的时间间隔内产生的碳酸盐沉积物。一些地区，如西班牙和埃及的地层，包含非海洋沉积物或重工的有孔虫，这使得边界的精确划分变得复杂。

Feature Specification.QuestionEn: What are the characteristics of the isotope composition data used for identifying the Paleocene-Eocene boundary?
Feature Specification.QuestionCn: 用于识别古新世-始新世边界的同位素组成数据的特征是什么？
Feature Specification.AnswerEn: δ13C measurements, δ18O measurements, carbonate rock samples, diagenetically less-altered micrites, LBF fragments, gas isotope ratio mass spectrometer
Feature Specification.AnswerCn: δ13C 测量, δ18O 测量, 碳酸盐岩样品, 成岩作用较少改变的微晶石灰岩, 大型底栖有孔虫碎片, 气体同位素比质谱仪

Feature Specification.QuestionEn: What specific attributes of the carbon isotope excursion profile are analyzed to understand carbon cycling during the PETM?
Feature Specification.QuestionCn: 在分析PETM期间的碳循环时，研究人员会关注碳同位素逸散曲线的哪些具体特征？
Feature Specification.AnswerEn: stepped CIE profile, large magnitude, three discrete intervals of decreasing carbon isotope values
Feature Specification.AnswerCn: 阶梯状CIE曲线，大幅度，三个离散区间的碳同位素值递减

Feature Specification.QuestionEn: What are the methods used to ensure the data on isotope composition is not affected by diagenetic alteration?
Feature Specification.QuestionCn: 确保同位素组成数据不受成岩作用影响的方法有哪些？
Feature Specification.AnswerEn: Sr and Mn concentrations, 87Sr/86Sr ratios, background δ13C_carb values
Feature Specification.AnswerCn: 锶和锰浓度，87Sr/86Sr 比值，背景 δ13C_carb 值

Quantification.QuestionEn: How many parallel limestone sections were analyzed for carbon isotope data in the Tingri area?
Quantification.QuestionCn: 在丁日地区分析了多少个平行的石灰岩剖面以获取碳同位素数据？

Quantification.QuestionEn: What is the total number of measurement techniques used to analyze isotopic and elemental compositions in the geochemical dataset?
Quantification.QuestionCn: 用于分析地球化学数据集中同位素和元素组成的测量技术总数是多少？

Quantification.QuestionEn: How many papers were published based on the geochemical data from the Tingri and Gamba sections?
Quantification.QuestionCn: 基于丁日和冈巴剖面的地球化学数据发表了多少篇论文？

Definition.QuestionEn: What is the significance of 'strontium isotope ratios' in geological studies?
Definition.QuestionCn: 在地质研究中，'锶同位素比'的重要性是什么？
Definition.AnswerEn: Strontium isotope ratios, specifically the 87Sr/86Sr ratio, are used in geological studies to assess the diagenetic alteration of carbonate rocks. These ratios can help determine whether the isotopic composition of the rocks has been affected by post-depositional processes, thus ensuring the reliability of the isotopic data for interpreting past environmental and climatic conditions.
Definition.AnswerCn: 锶同位素比率，特别是87Sr/86Sr比率，在地质研究中用于评估碳酸盐岩的成岩改造。这些比率可以帮助确定岩石的同位素组成是否受到沉积后过程的影响，从而确保同位素数据在解释过去的环境和气候条件时的可靠性。

Definition.QuestionEn: What does the term 'shallow benthic zones (SBZs)' refer to in the context of biostratigraphy?
Definition.QuestionCn: 在生物地层学的背景下，“浅层底栖带（SBZs）”指的是什么？
Definition.AnswerEn: Shallow benthic zones (SBZs) refer to specific ecological zones in shallow marine environments that are characterized by the presence of certain types of benthic organisms, such as larger benthic foraminifera (LBFs). These zones are used in biostratigraphy to delineate time intervals and correlate sedimentary layers across different geographic areas, aiding in the identification of geological boundaries like the Paleocene/Eocene boundary.
Definition.AnswerCn: 浅水底栖区（SBZs）指的是浅海环境中特定的生态区，这些区域的特征是存在某些类型的底栖生物，如大型底栖有孔虫（LBFs）。这些区域在生物地层学中用于划分时间间隔，并在不同地理区域之间进行沉积层的对比，有助于识别地质边界，如古新世/始新世边界。

Comparison.QuestionEn: How do the methods used to analyze carbon and oxygen isotopes in carbonate rock samples from the Tingri and Gamba sections compare in terms of their precision and potential sources of error?
Comparison.QuestionCn: 如何分析来自丁日和冈巴剖面的碳酸盐岩样品中的碳和氧同位素的方法在精度和潜在误差来源方面进行比较？
Comparison.AnswerEn: The carbon and oxygen isotopes in the carbonate rock samples from the Tingri and Gamba sections were analyzed using gas isotope ratio mass spectrometry (MAT251) at the University of Bremen, with careful micro-drilling to obtain diagenetically less-altered micrites and LBF fragments. Potential sources of error could include the selection of sample sites and the precision of the micro-drilling technique, which are critical for ensuring that the least altered samples are analyzed.
Comparison.AnswerCn: 来自丁日和冈巴剖面的碳酸盐岩样品中的碳氧同位素通过不来梅大学的气体同位素比质谱仪（MAT251）进行了分析，采用精细的微钻技术以获取变质程度较低的微晶石和有孔虫碎片。潜在的误差来源可能包括样品采集地点的选择和微钻技术的精确度，这对于确保分析到变质程度最低的样品至关重要。

Comparison.QuestionEn: What are the similarities and differences in the challenges faced when identifying the Paleocene/Eocene boundary in the shallow Tethyan Ocean compared to other regions like Spain and Egypt?
Comparison.QuestionCn: 在识别古新世/始新世边界时，浅海特提斯洋与西班牙和埃及等其他地区面临的挑战有哪些相似之处和不同之处？
Comparison.AnswerEn: In the shallow Tethyan Ocean, identifying the Paleocene/Eocene boundary involves constructing a biostratigraphy and examining the response of larger benthic foraminifera (LBFs), with challenges including the preservation of carbonate sediments and the completeness of the sections on millennial time scales. In contrast, some sections from Spain and Egypt face challenges due to non-marine sediments or reworked LBFs, which complicate precise boundary designation.
Comparison.AnswerCn: 在浅海特提斯洋中，识别古新世/始新世边界涉及构建生物地层，并研究大型底栖有孔虫（LBFs）的响应，面临的挑战包括碳酸盐沉积物的保存和在千年时间尺度上剖面的完整性。相比之下，来自西班牙和埃及的一些剖面由于非海洋沉积物或再加工的LBFs而面临挑战，这使得精确的边界划定变得复杂。

Interpretation.QuestionEn: What can be inferred about the effectiveness and limitations of using carbon isotope excursions (CIE) in interpreting ancient global warming events from geochemical data?
Interpretation.QuestionCn: 从地球化学数据中解释古代全球变暖事件时使用碳同位素偏移（CIE）的有效性和局限性可以推断出什么？
Interpretation.AnswerEn: The carbon isotope excursions (CIE) are used to indicate massive additions of 13C-depleted carbon into the atmosphere-ocean system, reflecting a global geochemical event. The CIE is documented in diverse substrates and environments, suggesting its reliability in indicating global changes. However, challenges remain in ensuring the completeness of carbonate sections on millennial time scales, which is crucial for precise boundary designations and interpretations of organism responses to the event.
Interpretation.AnswerCn: 碳同位素偏移（CIE）用于指示大量13C贫碳的释放进入大气-海洋系统，反映全球地球化学事件。CIE在多种基质和环境中都有记录，表明其在指示全球变化方面的可靠性。然而，在确保碳酸盐层在千年时间尺度上的完整性方面仍然存在挑战，这对于精确的边界划分和对生物对该事件反应的解释至关重要。

Causal Antecedent.QuestionEn: What causes variations in carbon isotope data from different depositional environments when studying the Paleocene-Eocene thermal maximum?
Causal Antecedent.QuestionCn: 在研究古新世-始新世热极大事件时，不同沉积环境中的碳同位素数据变化的原因是什么？
Causal Antecedent.AnswerEn: The carbon isotope data from different depositional environments, such as lake, carbonate ramp, continental slope, and open ocean, show variations due to the complex processes of carbon injection during the Paleocene-Eocene thermal maximum (PETM). The expanded stepped carbon isotope excursion (CIE) profile, consisting of three discrete intervals, suggests multiple carbon releases and indicates complex carbon cycling in these environments.
Causal Antecedent.AnswerCn: 来自不同沉积环境（如湖泊、碳酸盐坡道、大陆坡和开放海洋）的碳同位素数据由于在古新世-始新世热极大期（PETM）期间碳注入的复杂过程而显示出变化。扩展的阶梯状碳同位素偏移（CIE）剖面由三个离散区间组成，表明存在多次碳释放，并指示这些环境中的碳循环复杂。

Causal Antecedent.QuestionEn: Why might some sections studied in other regions fail to provide complete records of the Paleocene/Eocene boundary?
Causal Antecedent.QuestionCn: 一些地区研究的某些层段可能未能提供完整的古新世/始新世边界记录的原因是什么？
Causal Antecedent.AnswerEn: Some sections from regions like Spain and Egypt may not provide complete records of the Paleocene/Eocene boundary due to the presence of non-marine sediments or reworked larger benthic foraminifera (LBFs) near the boundary. Additionally, even fully marine sections might lack completeness on millennial time scales or fail to preserve carbonate sediments produced during this brief geological interval, impacting the precision of boundary designation and understanding of LBF response.
Causal Antecedent.AnswerCn: 一些地区，如西班牙和埃及，可能由于边界附近存在非海洋沉积物或重工大型底栖有孔虫（LBFs），而未能提供完整的古新世/始新世边界记录。此外，即使是完全海洋的剖面，在千年时间尺度上也可能缺乏完整性，或未能保存这一短暂地质区间内产生的碳酸盐沉积物，从而影响边界划定的精确性和对LBF反应的理解。

Causal Antecedent.QuestionEn: What are the causes behind the challenges in identifying the primary nature of the stepped carbon isotope excursion profile during the PETM?
Causal Antecedent.QuestionCn: 在识别PETM期间阶梯状碳同位素偏移特征的主要性质时，面临的挑战原因是什么？
Causal Antecedent.AnswerEn: The challenges in identifying the primary nature of the stepped carbon isotope excursion (CIE) profile are caused by discrepancies in δ13C measurements from planktonic and benthic foraminifera, which do not reproduce the stepped profile observed in bulk carbonate. Additionally, vital effects of nannoplankton are thought to cause the stepped profile, raising questions about its authenticity and necessitating further exploration for a high-resolution, expanded profile.
Causal Antecedent.AnswerCn: 识别阶梯碳同位素偏移（CIE）特征的主要性质面临的挑战，源于浮游和底栖有孔虫的δ13C测量存在差异，这些测量未能再现在散装碳酸盐中观察到的阶梯型特征。此外，纳米浮游植物的生理效应被认为导致了阶梯型特征，这引发了对其真实性的质疑，并需要进一步探索以获得高分辨率、扩展的剖面。

Causal Consequence.QuestionEn: What happens when geochemical data from shallow-marine carbonate sections are used to interpret the Paleocene-Eocene thermal maximum event?
Causal Consequence.QuestionCn: 当浅海碳酸盐层的地球化学数据被用来解释古新世-始新世热极大事件时，会发生什么？
Causal Consequence.AnswerEn: The use of geochemical data from shallow-marine carbonate sections, such as carbon isotope composition and carbonate content, allows for the identification of the Paleocene/Eocene boundary and the carbon isotope excursion (CIE) profile, providing insights into carbon cycling and climate changes during the PETM.
Causal Consequence.AnswerCn: 利用浅海碳酸盐层的地球化学数据，如碳同位素组成和碳酸盐含量，可以识别古新世/始新世边界和碳同位素逸散（CIE）剖面，从而提供关于PETM期间碳循环和气候变化的见解。

Causal Consequence.QuestionEn: What are the potential consequences of identifying incomplete stratigraphic sections on the interpretation of the Paleocene-Eocene boundary?
Causal Consequence.QuestionCn: 识别不完整的地层剖面对古新世-始新世边界的解释可能产生的后果是什么？
Causal Consequence.AnswerEn: Identifying incomplete stratigraphic sections may lead to challenges in precisely designating the Paleocene/Eocene boundary and understanding the response of larger benthic foraminifera to the PETM, potentially affecting the reconstruction of biostratigraphy and interpretation of large-scale environmental changes during this period.
Causal Consequence.AnswerCn: 识别不完整的地层剖面可能会导致在精确划定古新世/始新世边界和理解大型底栖有孔虫对古新世-始新世温室气候事件（PETM）的反应方面面临挑战，这可能会影响生物地层的重建和对该时期大规模环境变化的解读。

Goal Orientation.QuestionEn: What are the goals of analyzing the carbon and oxygen isotope composition in carbonate rocks within the context of the Paleocene-Eocene thermal maximum?
Goal Orientation.QuestionCn: 在古新世-始新世热极大事件的背景下，分析碳酸盐岩中的碳和氧同位素组成的目标是什么？
Goal Orientation.AnswerEn: The analysis of carbon and oxygen isotope composition in carbonate rocks aims to understand the response of larger benthic foraminifera (LBFs) to the Paleocene-Eocene thermal maximum (PETM), locate the position of the Paleocene/Eocene boundary in the Tethyan shallow benthic zones (SBZs), and investigate the carbon cycling in the open surface ocean during this period.
Goal Orientation.AnswerCn: 对碳和氧同位素组成的分析在碳酸盐岩中旨在了解大型底栖有孔虫（LBFs）对古新世-始新世热极大期（PETM）的响应，确定在特提斯浅水底栖区（SBZs）中古新世/始新世边界的位置，并研究该时期开放表层海洋中的碳循环。

Goal Orientation.QuestionEn: Why is it important to use isotopic and elemental analysis techniques like TIMS and LA-ICPMS for studying geochemical events related to the Paleocene-Eocene transition?
Goal Orientation.QuestionCn: 使用同位素和元素分析技术，如TIMS和LA-ICPMS，研究与古新世-始新世过渡相关的地球化学事件的重要性是什么？
Goal Orientation.AnswerEn: Using techniques such as TIMS and LA-ICPMS is important for ensuring the accuracy and reliability of isotopic and elemental data, which are critical for excluding diagenetic alteration and for identifying changes in carbon isotope composition that reflect global geochemical events like the Paleocene-Eocene thermal maximum (PETM).
Goal Orientation.AnswerCn: 使用TIMS和LA-ICPMS等技术对于确保同位素和元素数据的准确性和可靠性至关重要，这些数据对于排除成岩改造和识别反映全球地球化学事件（如古新世-始新世热事件（PETM））的碳同位素组成变化至关重要。

Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionEn: What specific procedures are involved in obtaining carbon isotope data from carbonate samples in the context of studying the Paleocene-Eocene thermal maximum?
Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionCn: 在研究古新世-始新世热峰时，从碳酸盐样品中获取碳同位素数据涉及哪些具体程序？
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerEn: In the context of studying the Paleocene-Eocene thermal maximum, carbon isotope data from carbonate samples are obtained by cutting samples to expose fresh surfaces. Diagenetically less-altered micrites and larger benthic foraminifera fragments are carefully micro-drilled under a light microscope. Approximately 20 g of material is collected from each sample, ground into powder, and reacted with phosphoric acid at 75 °C. The isotopic composition of the resulting CO2 is measured using a Finnigan MAT 251 gas isotope ratio mass spectrometer.
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerCn: 在研究古新世-始新世热极大事件的背景下，从碳酸盐样品中获得碳同位素数据，通过切割样品以暴露新鲜表面。对较少成岩改造的微晶石灰岩和较大底栖有孔虫碎片进行仔细的显微钻孔。每个样品收集约20克材料，研磨成粉末，并在75°C下与磷酸反应。使用Finnigan MAT 251气体同位素比质谱仪测量生成的CO2的同位素组成。

Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionEn: What are the steps taken to ensure that the carbon isotope records from the Tingri area reflect carbon cycling in the open surface ocean, and how is diagenetic alteration ruled out?
Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionCn: 为了确保来自定日地区的碳同位素记录反映开放表层海洋中的碳循环，采取了哪些步骤，并且如何排除成岩作用的改变？
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerEn: To ensure that carbon isotope records from the Tingri area reflect carbon cycling in the open surface ocean, the study compares the background δ13C_carb values at Tingri with those of mixed-layer foraminifer Acarinina from different ODP Sites. Additionally, Sr and Mn concentrations and 87Sr/86Sr ratios are used to exclude the possibility of diagenetic alteration.
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerCn: 为了确保Tingri地区的碳同位素记录反映开放表层海洋中的碳循环，该研究将Tingri的背景δ13C_carb值与来自不同ODP站点的混合层有孔虫Acarinina的值进行比较。此外，使用Sr和Mn浓度以及87Sr/86Sr比率来排除成岩改造的可能性。

Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionEn: How is the carbon isotope data from bulk carbonate used to identify and analyze the expanded stepped CIE profile during the PETM?
Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionCn: 如何利用整体碳酸盐中的碳同位素数据来识别和分析PETM期间扩展的阶梯状CIE曲线？
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerEn: Carbon isotope data from bulk carbonate are used to identify and analyze the expanded stepped CIE profile by examining two parallel limestone sections. The data reveal a stepped CIE profile consisting of three discrete intervals of decreasing carbon isotope values. These intervals are correlated on an inter-regional scale across different depositional environments, indicating multiple carbon releases during the PETM.
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerCn: 来自整体碳酸盐的碳同位素数据用于识别和分析扩展的阶梯式碳同位素异常（CIE）特征，通过检查两个平行的石灰岩剖面。这些数据揭示了一个阶梯式的CIE特征，由三个不同的碳同位素值递减区间组成。这些区间在不同沉积环境中进行了区域间的相关性分析，表明在古新世-始新世界（PETM）期间发生了多次碳释放。

Enablement.QuestionEn: What technological methods are utilized to ensure the accuracy and integrity of geochemical data collected from carbonate sections during the Paleocene-Eocene thermal maximum?
Enablement.QuestionCn: 在古新世-始新世热极大事件期间，确保从碳酸盐层收集的地球化学数据的准确性和完整性所采用的技术方法有哪些？
Enablement.AnswerEn: The accuracy and integrity of geochemical data are ensured through the use of gas isotope ratio mass spectrometry (MAT251) for carbon and oxygen isotopes, thermal ionization mass spectrometry (TIMS) for strontium isotopes, and secondary ion mass spectrometry (SIMS) for in situ carbon isotope composition. Additionally, laser ablation inductively coupled plasma mass spectrometry (LA-ICPMS) is used for in situ elemental analysis.
Enablement.AnswerCn: 通过使用气体同位素比质谱仪（MAT251）进行碳和氧同位素的分析、热离子化质谱（TIMS）进行锶同位素的分析，以及次级离子质谱（SIMS）进行原位碳同位素组成的分析，确保了地球化学数据的准确性和完整性。此外，激光剥蚀电感耦合等离子体质谱（LA-ICPMS）用于原位元素分析。

Enablement.QuestionEn: How does the selection of sample sites and preparation techniques impact the ability to study carbon isotope excursions during the PETM?
Enablement.QuestionCn: 样本地点的选择和准备技术如何影响研究PETM期间碳同位素偏移的能力？
Enablement.AnswerEn: The selection of sample sites, such as the Tingri and Gamba sections in south Tibet, and preparation techniques, like micro-drilling under a light microscope to obtain diagenetically less-altered micrites and LBF fragments, are crucial for studying carbon isotope excursions. These methods help ensure that the samples reflect the original geochemical conditions and enable the precise identification of the Paleocene/Eocene boundary.
Enablement.AnswerCn: 样本地点的选择，如南藏的丁日和甘巴剖面，以及准备技术，如在光学显微镜下进行微钻，以获取地质变质程度较低的微晶石灰岩和有孔虫碎片，对于研究碳同位素偏移至关重要。这些方法有助于确保样本反映原始的地球化学条件，并能够精确识别古新世/始新世边界。

Enablement.QuestionEn: What conditions or methodologies are necessary to distinguish between in situ and reworked larger benthic foraminifera in carbonate sections when studying the Paleocene-Eocene boundary?
Enablement.QuestionCn: 在研究古新世-始新世边界时，区分原位和重工大型底栖有孔虫的条件或方法论是什么？
Enablement.AnswerEn: To distinguish between in situ and reworked larger benthic foraminifera, researchers must ensure that the studied sections comprise fully marine carbonate sediments and are complete on millennial time scales. This involves careful analysis of stratigraphic intervals and the use of carbon isotope data to confirm the preservation of carbonate sediments produced during the PETM.
Enablement.AnswerCn: 为了区分原位和重工的大型底栖有孔虫，研究人员必须确保研究的剖面包含完全的海洋碳酸盐沉积物，并在千年时间尺度上是完整的。这涉及对地层间隔的仔细分析以及使用碳同位素数据来确认在PETM期间产生的碳酸盐沉积物的保存情况。

Expectation.QuestionEn: Why might researchers expect challenges in obtaining complete marine carbonate sections when studying the Paleocene-Eocene thermal maximum (PETM)?
Expectation.QuestionCn: 研究人员在研究古新世-始新世热极大事件（PETM）时，可能会预期在获取完整的海洋碳酸盐层段时面临挑战，原因是什么？
Expectation.AnswerEn: Researchers might expect challenges in obtaining complete marine carbonate sections due to issues like non-marine sediments or reworked foraminifera, which can affect the stratigraphic intervals close to the Paleocene/Eocene boundary. These factors can hinder the accurate designation of the P/E boundary and understanding of larger benthic foraminifera (LBF) responses to the PETM.
Expectation.AnswerCn: 研究人员可能会在获取完整的海洋碳酸盐层段时面临挑战，例如非海洋沉积物或再加工的有孔虫，这些因素可能影响到接近古新世/始新世边界的地层间隔。这些因素可能妨碍对P/E边界的准确划定以及对大弯曲有孔虫（LBF）对PETM反应的理解。

Expectation.QuestionEn: What could be the reasons for expecting discrepancies in carbon isotope excursion (CIE) profiles when comparing different depositional environments?
Expectation.QuestionCn: 在比较不同沉积环境时，预期碳同位素偏移（CIE）剖面存在差异的原因可能是什么？
Expectation.AnswerEn: Discrepancies in CIE profiles might be expected when comparing different depositional environments because factors such as local diagenetic alterations, differing sedimentation rates, and varying nannoplankton vital effects can lead to variations in the recorded isotope values, thereby making inter-regional correlation challenging.
Expectation.AnswerCn: 在比较不同沉积环境时，CIE（碳同位素事件）剖面中的差异可能是预期的，因为局部成岩作用、不同的沉积速率以及不同的纳米浮游植物生物效应等因素可能导致记录的同位素值的变化，从而使得区域间的对比变得具有挑战性。

Expectation.QuestionEn: Why might researchers anticipate difficulties in using isotope data to reflect open surface ocean carbon cycling in shallow epicontinental seas?
Expectation.QuestionCn: 为什么研究人员预计使用同位素数据来反映浅海陆架海域的开放表面海洋碳循环会遇到困难？
Expectation.AnswerEn: Researchers might anticipate difficulties because the isotope data from shallow epicontinental seas might be affected by regional geological processes or diagenetic alterations that can obscure the primary isotopic signals, making it challenging to extrapolate findings to represent carbon cycling in the open surface ocean.
Expectation.AnswerCn: 研究人员可能会预见到困难，因为来自浅表大陆架海域的同位素数据可能受到区域地质过程或成岩变化的影响，这可能会掩盖主要的同位素信号，从而使得将研究结果外推到代表开放表层海洋中的碳循环变得具有挑战性。

Judgmental.QuestionEn: How do you evaluate the effectiveness of using isotopic composition analysis in carbonate sections to trace geochemical events such as the Paleocene-Eocene thermal maximum?
Judgmental.QuestionCn: 如何评估在碳酸盐岩层中使用同位素组成分析来追踪地球化学事件（如古新世-始新世热极大事件）的有效性？
Judgmental.AnswerEn: Isotopic composition analysis in carbonate sections is considered effective for tracing geochemical events like the Paleocene-Eocene thermal maximum. This method allows for the identification of carbon isotope excursions (CIE) which are indicative of massive carbon input into the atmosphere-ocean system. The method's reliability is enhanced by using well-preserved carbonate samples and comparing data with other global records.
Judgmental.AnswerCn: 碳酸盐岩段的同位素组成分析被认为是追踪地球化学事件（如古新世-始新世热事件）的有效方法。该方法可以识别碳同位素偏移（CIE），这表明大量碳被输入到大气-海洋系统中。通过使用保存良好的碳酸盐样本并与其他全球记录进行比较，该方法的可靠性得到了增强。

Judgmental.QuestionEn: In your opinion, what are the potential benefits and limitations of using parallel limestone sections from different regions to study the carbon isotope excursion profile during the PETM?
Judgmental.QuestionCn: 在我看来，使用来自不同地区的平行石灰岩剖面来研究PETM期间的碳同位素偏移特征的潜在好处和局限性是什么？
Judgmental.AnswerEn: The potential benefits of using parallel limestone sections include the ability to correlate data across different depositional environments and enhance the understanding of regional vs. global carbon cycle changes. Limitations might include regional variations that could obscure global trends and potential diagenetic effects that could alter isotopic signals.
Judgmental.AnswerCn: 使用平行石灰岩剖面的潜在好处包括能够跨不同沉积环境关联数据，并增强对区域与全球碳循环变化的理解。限制可能包括区域变化可能掩盖全球趋势，以及潜在的成岩作用可能改变同位素信号。

Request/Directive.QuestionEn: Please describe the technological instruments and techniques used for measuring isotopic compositions and element concentrations in carbonate samples.
Request/Directive.QuestionCn: 请描述用于测量碳酸盐样品中同位素组成和元素浓度的技术仪器和技术。
Request/Directive.AnswerEn: The isotopic compositions of carbon and oxygen in carbonate samples were measured using a gas isotope ratio mass spectrometer (Finnigan MAT 251) at the University of Bremen. Strontium isotopes were analyzed through thermal ionization mass spectrometry (TIMS). The calcium carbonate content was determined using an acid dissolution method. In situ carbon isotope compositions were obtained via secondary ion mass spectrometry (SIMS), and elemental concentrations were measured using laser ablation inductively coupled plasma mass spectrometry (LA-ICPMS).
Request/Directive.AnswerCn: 碳酸盐样品的碳和氧同位素组成通过在不来梅大学的气体同位素比质谱仪（Finnigan MAT 251）进行测量。锶同位素通过热离子化质谱法（TIMS）进行分析。钙碳酸盐含量采用酸溶解法确定。原位碳同位素组成通过次级离子质谱法（SIMS）获得，元素浓度则使用激光剥蚀电感耦合等离子体质谱法（LA-ICPMS）进行测量。
